Reviews.Title: Tablet Became Inop in Less than 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Rogers "Mikestroh"

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo3ICHFQJG9DMIHcurrentClick) { return cv_mo3ICHFQJG9DMIHcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:09 MinsTablet initially worked well then it started to exhibit color bleeding issues while watching You tube Videos. then one day when I started up the tablet, it stayed in the boot mode. The Toshiba symbol would initially display then when it switched to light effects mode prior to going to the main screen it freezes in this mode. Very disappointed. I've attached a video to show the issue.

Reviews.Title: Canadian Model no warranty in usa
Reviews.Author: J. Fisk
Reviews.Content: canadian model is supposed to have a warranty, but if you have an issue and have to send in your tablet for repairs, the company will not ship to u.s. address.  so there's basically no warranty if you live in usa.

Reviews.Title: super litttle tablet.
Reviews.Author: Anton51
Reviews.Content: Best little tablet. Super value now that the price has come down. Screen is amazing. This tablet just grows on you.
